subject: Homeless Persons
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Afghanistan defeated Russia, 5-4, in the final of the sixth Homeless World Cup in Federation Square in Melbourne, Australia. Zambia beat Liberia, 7-1, in the first women’s final. The tournament featured teams from 56 countries.
